ygData.msgSnippet: The poison made by the NPC rogue: Spider Venom, effect: Weakening poison classes ALL,races ALL 2 spider venom sacks, 1 Crow s brew, 20gp

The poison made by the NPC rogue: Spider Venom, effect: Weakening poison classes
ALL,races ALL
2 spider venom sacks, 1 Crow's brew, 20gp
